name: Diwan Sitta
description: This collection of poems, entitled Diwan Sitta, contains mainly the 6 chapters in which Cheikh Ibrahim Inyass praise the prophet Muhammad:  - Taysrul Wussl - Iksru Sadt - Salwatu Chujn - Awthaqoul Ur - Chif-ul Askham - Mansikou Ahloul Widd  Three more books have also been added to the application:  - Kanzoul rifn - Nrul Haqq - Seyroul Qalb
